info.title: PurviewDataQuality
info.description:
Purview Data Quality Service is a fully managed cloud service that enables users to
monitor, assess, and improve the quality of their data assets across their organization.
Users can define data quality rules, execute scans and assessments, track quality metrics
over time, and ensure data meets business requirements. At the same time, Data Quality
helps organizations maintain trust in their data and get more value from their existing
data investments. This spec defines REST API of Purview Data Quality Service.

get.description: Retrieves metadata for all assets in an account with pagination support. Returns up to 10 assets per request.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token for pagination. Use this to get all results until continuationToken from the response becomes null.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

put.description: Inserts metadata for multiple assets into a new account ID.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Bulk asset metadata to insert

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

post.description: Triggers a long-running observation job for a specific data asset.

parameters.name: businessDomainId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the business domain containing the data product

parameters.name: dataProductId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data product containing the data asset

parameters.name: dataAssetId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data asset

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Job configuration request payload

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

post.description: Creates or updates the profile for a given data asset within a business domain. Supports polling as a long-running operation.

parameters.name: businessDomainId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the business domain containing the data product

parameters.name: dataProductId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data product containing the data asset

parameters.name: dataAssetId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data asset

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Profile entity request payload

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

delete.description: Deletes a specific observation associated with a data asset.

parameters.name: dataAssetId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data asset

parameters.name: observationId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the observation metadata

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

delete.description: Deletes a specific profile run for a given data asset within a business domain.

parameters.name: businessDomainId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the business domain

parameters.name: dataProductId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data product

parameters.name: dataAssetId

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Retrieves the opinion trend for a specific profile rule under a given data asset.

parameters.name: businessDomainId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the business domain containing the data product

parameters.name: dataProductId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data product containing the data asset

parameters.name: dataAssetId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the data asset whose rule opinion trend is being retrieved

parameters.name: ruleId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the rule for opinion trend retrieval

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time for the opinion trend query. If specified, endTime must also be provided. Maximum time window is 90 days.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time for the opinion trend query. Can only be used with startTime. Maximum time window is 90 days.

parameters.name: maxRecordsToReturn
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return in a single request. Must be between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

errorRowWriteFormat.description: Specifies the format in which error rows are written (e.g., CSV, Parquet).

errorRowWriteFormat.description: Specifies the format in which error rows are written (e.g., CSV, Parquet).

ScopedAssetMetadataUpdate.description: Scoped asset metadata configuration linked to a specific data asset.

id.description: Unique identifier for the scoped asset metadata entity.

description.description: Descriptive text providing details about the scoped asset metadata.

businessDomain.description: Reference to the associated Business Domain.

dataProduct.description: Reference to the associated Data Product.

dataAsset.description: Reference to the associated Data Asset.

runtime.description: Runtime configuration parameters defining error row behavior and output format.

favouriteColumnPaths.description: List of favorite column paths selected for quick access or monitoring.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this metadata was created.

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp when this metadata was last modified.

createdBy.description: Identifier of the user who created this metadata.

lastModifiedBy.description: Identifier of the user who last modified this metadata.

ETag.description: Entity tag used for concurrency control and version validation.

ScoreSnapshot.description: Comprehensive score snapshot with business domain, data product, asset scoring, and validation results

rules.description: Rules with their scores and validation results

ScoredRule.description: Rule definition with scoring and validation results

queryExecuted.description: The query which has been executed

typeProperties.description: Properties related to the data asset

SnapshotJob.description: Job information associated with a score snapshot

StatusMonitor.description: Status monitoring with execution state, progress tracking, and error reporting

id.description: Unique identifier of the monitored operation

TypeProperties.description: Type-specific configuration properties for data quality rules.

columns.description: List of columns for multi-column or relational rules (e.g., Duplicate, CustomTruth).

pattern.description: Regex or pattern-based validation logic for format rules.

condition.description: Main logical condition or expression defining validation criteria.

filterCriteria.description: Optional filter condition to limit rows that are validated by this rule.

emptyCriteria.description: Optional condition defining when a field or column is considered empty.
